name: PaleoDeepDive
body:
### Welcome to PaleoDeepDive
The PaleoDeepDive (PDD) statistical machine reading and learning system was developed to extract paleontological data from scientific literature, ie. dark data. [DeepDive](https://web.stanford.edu/~netj/tmp/deepdive/) is the base of PDD. DeepDive is a trained system, which means it learns and gets better with repeated iterations and more data. PDD is a variant of DeepDive specializing in extracting data from paleontological literature, and outputting useful fossil data, specifically fossil size data.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
